column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Breakfast in bed shot (3/5): Really interesting concept. Its bourbon with maple syrup
column2: chased with orange juice and bacon. To be honest
column3: the shot itself was so thick it was kind of gross having thick tasting bourbon go down your throat
column4: but it did taste like pancakes so not too bad. The best part would be the bacon you eat at the end. Nonetheless this was a fun shot to drink with the whole table for brunch.
